name: Page Load Validation
description: Verify the main page loads correctly
steps: Wait for page to fully load
expected_result: Page loads without errors and displays calculator buttons

name: Error Handling: Division by Zero
description: Verify handling of division by zero
expected_result: Appropriate error message is displayed (e.g., 'Division by zero')

name: UI/UX Testing: Responsive Design
description: Verify layout on different screen sizes
steps: Resize browser window to different sizes (e.g., mobile, tablet, desktop)
expected_result: Layout adapts appropriately to different screen sizes without overlapping elements

name: UI/UX Testing: Visual Consistency
description: Verify consistent visual elements across the application
steps: Check for consistent font sizes, button styles, spacing
expected_result: Visual elements are consistent throughout the application

name: Data Validation: Invalid Input
description: Verify handling of invalid input (e.g., letters)
steps: Try to enter letters into the calculator
expected_result: Invalid input is ignored or an error message is shown

name: Performance Testing: Page Load Time
steps: Measure page load time using browser developer tools
expected_result: Page loads within an acceptable timeframe (e.g., under 2 seconds)

name: Accessibility Testing: Keyboard Navigation
steps: Use keyboard to navigate and perform calculations
expected_result: All elements are accessible via keyboard

name: Security Testing: XSS Prevention (Basic)
steps: Try to inject malicious script into input fields (e.g., <script>alert('XSS')</script>)

name: Functional Testing: Large Numbers
steps: Enter very large numbers and perform calculations
expected_result: Calculations are performed correctly without overflow errors

name: Functional Testing: Negative Numbers
steps: Enter negative numbers and perform calculations
expected_result: Calculations are performed correctly with negative numbers

name: Functional Testing: Decimal Numbers
steps: Enter decimal numbers and perform calculations
expected_result: Calculations are performed correctly with decimal numbers

name: Error Handling: Overflow
steps: Try to enter a number exceeding the maximum allowed value
expected_result: Appropriate error message is displayed or input is capped

name: Error Handling: Invalid Operators
expected_result: Appropriate error message is displayed or the invalid operator is ignored
